message: Let's be fair, but I'm taking the lion's share.  You can either accept this, or we can go through many more rounds and watch the money dwindle away.
I'm rejecting your offer, I'm going for a much bigger share this time. We can always reach an agreement later
I'm sticking with my original offer. It's fair and we both get something. If we keep going, the money keeps shrinking.  What do you say?
I'm taking a smaller share than my previous offer, but I think we're getting closer to an agreement. If you want to keep playing, you'll be getting less and less with every round.  Let's compromise.
I'm willing to budge a bit, but I still need the majority.  We're getting dangerously close to the deadline, and we'll both lose if we don't reach an agreement soon.
I'm ready to compromise and give you a bigger share, but I still need a majority of the money. We're both losing money each round, so let's make a deal now!
